channel.title: Connector Upgrade on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Connector Upgrade on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: First steps
item.description: First steps with Connector 365 Upgrade App Here you will find all the important information and notes on installing the Connector 365 Upgrade App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In the event that a question could not be answered, we will be happy to help you personally. You will find the necessary contact information on the support page.

item.title: Using the Connector 365 Upgrade App
item.description: Using the Connector 365 Upgrade App Here you can find all important information and hints for the correct use of the Connector 365 Upgrade App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we are happy to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.
